Articles.Content:
Welp, this is the end.

KSP is gone as an IP.  KSP2 has sealed its fate. 

KSP is an era, not just a game. The spirit of the community will live on in other, bigger places, like spiritual successors that are being made as we speak. The community spirit will never die.

Ad Astra, Per Aspera.  To the stars, through hardship. Just as HarvesteR intended when he made this game as a pet project 15(?) years ago.

This is a place to post your memories of KSP as an IP, an era, and the inspiration of a generation.

Thank you KSP.
